Description: Green glazed steatite lentoid, pierced longitudinally, plain back, base inscribed with prenomen between 2 maat feathers, neb below.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1913 / Catalogue of Egyptian scarabs, etc. in the British Museum (850)
Acquisition name: Purchased through: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
Purchased from: Giza Museum (and other sources)
